lead_paragraph: A would-be robber in Pennsylvania had some pretty poor timing when he pulled a gun on his taxi driver with a sheriff's deputy behind him, police say.

headline.main: Would-Be Robber Tries to Stick Up Cab With Deputy Behind Him
headline.print_headline: Would-Be Robber Tries to Stick Up Cab With Deputy Behind Him

snippet: A would-be robber in Pennsylvania had some pretty poor timing when he pulled a gun on his taxi driver with a sheriff's deputy behind him, police say.
